FuncDef: This command specifies the server TCP or UDP port number to use in the application definition.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that the value configured and the value in the flow are equal.
Specifies that the value configured differs from the value in the flow.
Specifies all port numbers greater than server-port-number match.
Specifies all port numbers less than server-port-number match.
Specifies a named port list containing a set or range of ports.
Specifies a valid server port number. Values-0 to 65535.
Specifies the starting or ending port number. Values-0 to 65535.

ExtraInfo: Default: no server-port (the server port is not used in the application definition)
